alternative_parents.description: Esters of sulfonic acid, which have the general structure RS(=O)2OR' (R,R' = organyl group or H).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonic acid esters

alternative_parents.description: Esters of sulfonic acid, which have the general structure RS(=O)2OR' (R,R' = organyl, not H).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acid esters

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing an oxathiolane moiety, which consists of a saturated aliphatic five-member ring with one oxygen atom, a sulfur atom, and three carbon atoms. Isomers  of oxaphospholane include meta-oxathiolane, and ortho-oxathiolane.
class.name: Oxathiolanes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as gamma sultones. These are organic compounds containing a gamma-sultone, a Intramolecular cyclic ester of hydroxy sulfonic acid, with a SO ring bond, and three ring carbon atoms.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a gamma-sultone, a Intramolecular cyclic ester of hydroxy sulfonic acid, with a SO ring bond, and three ring carbon atoms.
direct_parent.name: Gamma sultones

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a gamma-sultone, a Intramolecular cyclic ester of hydroxy sulfonic acid, with a SO ring bond, and three ring carbon atoms.
subclass.name: Gamma sultones

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
